components.text: [size=17]What is the effect of reducing Days Sales Outstanding?[/size]
[size=17]By reducing Days Sales Outstanding the cash flow is improved while saving costs for taking out a loan.[/size]

[size=19][color=#000000][b]Savings Potential[/b][/color][/size][size=19][color=#000000] =
[/color][/size][color=#000000][size=17]affected invoice volume * DSO reduction * loan interest rate / 365 days[/size][/color]

formulas.name: Affected Invoice Volume
formulas.text:
SUM(

CASE
    WHEN
    CALC_THROUGHPUT( LAST_OCCURRENCE [ 'Create Delivery' ] TO FIRST_OCCURRENCE [ 'Create Invoice' ], REMAP_TIMESTAMPS ( "_CEL_O2C_ACTIVITIES"."EVENTTIME",DAYS) ) > <%= D2I_TARGET %>
    AND
    CALC_THROUGHPUT( LAST_OCCURRENCE [ 'Create Delivery' ] TO FIRST_OCCURRENCE [ 'Create Invoice' ], REMAP_TIMESTAMPS ( "_CEL_O2C_ACTIVITIES"."EVENTTIME",DAYS) ) < <%= D2I_MAX %>
    THEN 
    "VBAP"."NETWR_CONVERTED"
    ELSE NULL
END
)

variables.name: savings
variables.value: SUM("BSEG"."WRBTR")*AVG(CASE WHEN <%=Payment_after%> - <%=Due_after%> > <%= bufferdays2 %> THEN 1.0 ELSE 0.0 END)*7/365<%= default_interest %>*<%= rp_late %>+SUM("BSEG"."WRBTR")*AVG(CASE WHEN <%=Payment_after%> - <%=Due_after%> < -1*<%= bufferdays1 %> THEN 1.0 ELSE 0.0 END)*7/365*<%= RoIC %>*<%= rp_early %>

variables.name: late_savings
variables.value: SUM("BSEG"."WRBTR")*AVG(CASE WHEN <%=Payment_after%> - <%=Due_after%> > <%= bufferdays2 %> THEN 1.0 ELSE 0.0 END)*7/365<%= default_interest %>*<%= rp_late %>

variables.name: early_savings
variables.value: SUM("BSEG"."WRBTR")*AVG(CASE WHEN <%=Payment_after%> - <%=Due_after%> < -1*<%= bufferdays1 %> THEN 1.0 ELSE 0.0 END)*7/365*<%= RoIC %>*<%= rp_early %>

variables.name: Due_after
variables.value: DAYS_BETWEEN(CASE WHEN ISNULL("BSEG"."ZBD1T") = 1 THEN "BSEG"."ZFBDT" ELSE ADD_DAYS("BSEG"."ZFBDT","BSEG"."ZBD1T_INT") END, PU_FIRST("BSEG", "_CEL_AP_ACTIVITIES"."EVENTTIME", "_CEL_AP_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_EN" = 'Due Date passed'))

variables.name: reworkActivities
variables.value: 'Change Baseline Date', 'Change Conditions for Discount', 'Change Payment Method', 'Change Payment Term', 'Change Payment Days 1', 'Change Item Text', 'Remove Payment Block', 'Cancel Invoice Receipt', 'Remove Baseline Date', 'Remove Dunning Block', 'Set Dunning Block', 'Set Payment Block'

variables.name: savings
variables.value: SUM("BSEG"."WRBTR")*AVG(CASE WHEN <%=Payment_after%> - <%=Due_after%> > <%= bufferdays2 %> THEN 1.0 ELSE 0.0 END)*7/365<%= default_interest %>*<%= rp_late %>+SUM("BSEG"."WRBTR")*AVG(CASE WHEN <%=Payment_after%> - <%=Due_after%> < -1*<%= bufferdays1 %> THEN 1.0 ELSE 0.0 END)*7/365*<%= RoIC %>*<%= rp_early %>

variables.name: late_savings
variables.value: SUM("BSEG"."WRBTR")*AVG(CASE WHEN <%=Payment_after%> - <%=Due_after%> > <%= bufferdays2 %> THEN 1.0 ELSE 0.0 END)*7/365<%= default_interest %>*<%= rp_late %>

variables.name: early_savings
variables.value: SUM("BSEG"."WRBTR")*AVG(CASE WHEN <%=Payment_after%> - <%=Due_after%> < -1*<%= bufferdays1 %> THEN 1.0 ELSE 0.0 END)*7/365*<%= RoIC %>*<%= rp_early %>

variables.name: Due_after
variables.value: DAYS_BETWEEN(CASE WHEN ISNULL("BSEG"."ZBD1T") = 1 THEN "BSEG"."ZFBDT" ELSE ADD_DAYS("BSEG"."ZFBDT","BSEG"."ZBD1T_INT") END, PU_FIRST("BSEG", "_CEL_AP_ACTIVITIES"."EVENTTIME", "_CEL_AP_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_EN" = 'Due Date passed'))

variables.name: reworkActivities
variables.value: 'Change Baseline Date', 'Change Conditions for Discount', 'Change Payment Method', 'Change Payment Term', 'Change Payment Days 1', 'Change Item Text', 'Remove Payment Block', 'Cancel Invoice Receipt', 'Remove Baseline Date', 'Remove Dunning Block', 'Set Dunning Block', 'Set Payment Block'

variables.name: reworkActivities
variables.value: 'Change Baseline Date', 'Change Conditions for Discount', 'Change Payment Method', 'Change Payment Term', 'Change Payment Days 1', 'Change Item Text', 'Remove Payment Block', 'Cancel Invoice Receipt', 'Remove Baseline Date', 'Remove Dunning Block', 'Set Dunning Block', 'Set Payment Block', 'Cancel Invoice'

formulas.name: Median Throughput Time
formulas.text: Median(CALC_THROUGHPUT( FIRST_OCCURRENCE [ 'Create Delivery' ] TO LAST_OCCURRENCE [ 'Create Invoice' ], REMAP_TIMESTAMPS ( "_CEL_O2C_ACTIVITIES"."EVENTTIME",DAYS) ) )

formulas.name: Savings per Year
formulas.text:
1.0*<%= Time_Factor %>*(<%= D2I_POT %>/100.0)*SUM(

CASE
    WHEN
    CALC_THROUGHPUT( LAST_OCCURRENCE [ 'Create Delivery' ] TO FIRST_OCCURRENCE [ 'Create Invoice' ], REMAP_TIMESTAMPS ( "_CEL_O2C_ACTIVITIES"."EVENTTIME",DAYS) ) > <%= D2I_TARGET %>
    AND
    CALC_THROUGHPUT( LAST_OCCURRENCE [ 'Create Delivery' ] TO FIRST_OCCURRENCE [ 'Create Invoice' ], REMAP_TIMESTAMPS ( "_CEL_O2C_ACTIVITIES"."EVENTTIME",DAYS) ) < <%= D2I_MAX %>
    THEN 
    ((CALC_THROUGHPUT( LAST_OCCURRENCE [ 'Create Delivery' ] TO FIRST_OCCURRENCE [ 'Create Invoice' ], REMAP_TIMESTAMPS ( "_CEL_O2C_ACTIVITIES"."EVENTTIME",DAYS) ) - <%= D2I_TARGET %>)/365.0)*(<%= ROE %>/100.0)*"VBAP"."NETWR_CONVERTED"
    ELSE NULL
END
)
